Source.Name: roccat-tools
Source.Description: Roccat consists of a shared library and other files shared by device specific applications for roccat hardware.

Package.Name: roccat-tools
Package.Description: Roccat consists of a shared library and other files shared by device specific applications for roccat hardware.

Package.Name: roccat-tools-arvo
Package.Description: Arvo consists of a console application and a GUI application. It helps users to manipulate the Profiles and Settings of a Roccat Arvo keyboard.

Package.Name: roccat-tools-devel
Package.Description: Roccat consists of a shared library and other files shared by device specific applications for roccat hardware.
